articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: DLSS 3 mod for Starfield has a controversial DRM paywall - The Verge
articles.description: Users have been critical of Starfield modder PureDark’s decision to lock DLSS version 3’s more advanced frame-generation features behind a subscription.
articles.content:
DLSS 3 mod for Starfield has a controversial DRM paywall
DLSS 3 mod for Starfield has a controversial DRM paywall
 / A modder has added support for Nvidias upscaling technology to Bethesdas new RPG… [+2689 chars]
